extName.message: Weave: Daim Duab Tag Nrho Cov Nplooj Ntawv & Ntes

extDescription.message: Ntes tag nrho, scrolling screenshots ntawm txhua nplooj ntawv web. Cia li txuag tag nrho nplooj ntawv ua ib daim duab zoo meej.

defaultActionDescription.message: Xaiv seb yuav ua li cas thaum koj nyem lub extension icon.

saveAsHeader.description: Header for the 'save as' toggle setting.

saveAsDescription.message: Yog tias qhib, koj tuaj yeem xaiv cov ntaub ntawv npe thiab qhov chaw rau txhua qhov download.
saveAsDescription.description: Description for the 'save as' toggle setting.

copyToClipboardJustification.message: Yuav tsum tau luam cov duab screenshot ntes mus rau lub clipboard.

screenshotGenericError.message: Ib qho yuam kev tshwm sim thaum lub sij hawm screenshot txheej txheem: $message$

viewerDescription.message: Koj nplooj ntawv ntes tau npaj txhij.

noScreenshotAltText.message: Tsis tuaj yeem thauj cov screenshot. Nws yuav raug tshem tawm ntawm qhov chaw cia.

supportHeader.description: Header for the support/sponsorship section on the options page.

supportDescription.message: Yog tias koj pom qhov txuas ntxiv no muaj txiaj ntsig, thov xav txog kev txhawb nqa nws txoj kev loj hlob. Koj qhov kev koom tes pab kuv mob siab rau ntau lub sijhawm rau cov yam ntxwv tshiab thiab kev txhim kho.
